title: Developer Schema
description: A schema for developer for developer Registry

devId.description: A Unique ID for each developer.

legalName.description: Legal name of the developer or the company

logo.description: A URL to the logo of the developer or the company. Should be square and 512x512 in PNG format
A URL to the logo of the developer or the company. Should be square and 512x512 in PNG format

name.description: name of the developer. This is used by OpenSea.

description.description: description of the developer. This is used by OpenSea.

external_url.description: The URL of the developer. This is used by OpenSea. This should be set to Meroku Protocol Explorer.

image.description: A URL to the logo of the developer. Should be square and 512x512 in PNG format. Used by OpenSea. This should automatically be set to the app logo from images field.

display_type.description: The display type of the trait

trait_type.description: The trait type of the trait

value.description: The value of the trait type
